name: Ext_R5_MessageDefinition_fo_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MessageDefinition.focus.code for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MessageDefinition.focus.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MessageDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The kind of resource that must be the focus for this message.
element.comment: `MessageDefinition.focus.code` maps to R4B `MessageDefinition.focus.code`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The kind of resource that must be the focus for this message.
element.comment: `MessageDefinition.focus.code` maps to R4B `MessageDefinition.focus.code`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.
